skillDescription.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Increases wearer's Effect Hit Rate by ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"40/45/50/55/60%","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":". When the wearer deals DMG to an enemy inflicted with Wind Shear, Burn, Shock, or Bleed, they will individually gain 1 stack of Prophet. This effect can stack up to 4 times. In a single battle, each type of DoT can only generate 1 stack of Prophet. Every stack of Prophet increases wearer's ATK by ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"5/6/7/8/9%","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" and the DoT dealt will ignore ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"7.2/7.9/8.6/9.3/10%","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" of the target's DEF.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
